Valuable Sueki Combining Info (Baseline Stats/Stat Order)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Breeding/Combining: Valuable Sueki Combining Info (Baseline Stats/Stat Order)
By Kurasu Soratobu on Thursday, January 17, 2002 - 04:34 am:

It's amazing what a dose of strong painkillers can make you wonder. In this case, I was playing around with a Sueki, wondering about what sort of combinations I can come up with. And in doing so, I accidently learned their 'adjusted' values, for those who are interested.

Sueki Suezo's Stats are listed elsewhere, but reproduced here for posterity:
LifPowIntSklSpdDef
9993873213551999


Much experimentation has revealed they get a stat-gain of '1' in everything (well, what I could test... obviously, I couldn't test the 999s). Thus, after adjusting, all the stats would be '0'. Unfortunately, a '0' must defer to baseline stats. What, then, is a Sueki's baselines?

A little experimentation and a lot of luck revealed that a Sueki is nothing but a Suezo with good stats and sucky, one week, lifespan.

Therefore:
LifPowIntSklSpdDef
8012017013090100
are the baseline stats for a Sueki.

Using DP's combining corrections, a Sueki Suezo is thus lined up: Int, Skl, Pow, Def, Spd, Lif

Now, I can only wonder what sort of 'great' combos a Sueki could make. ^_-

By Omni Strunks on Thursday, January 17, 2002 - 01:11 pm:

Not surprising that Sueki's baseline stats were of a pure. You do, of course, get the pure when combining two rares. (Sueki and Sueki get Suezo. Moo and Moo get Dragon, Poison and Poison get Pixie...etc.)
